languages.text: {n}Кибелла не смотрит на вас прямо — лишь урывками, словно она и не здесь вовсе. Однако на ее губах пляшет улыбка.{/n} "Со мной? Ничего такого, что не принято в текущем положении".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла поднимает на вас взгляд — и вы вновь замечаете странное движение в его глубине. Однако на губах культистки пляшет улыбка.{/n} "Со мной? Ничего такого, что не принято в текущем положении".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah does not look at you directly. Instead, she merely shoots you passing glances, as if she is not quite here. Her lips, however, bear a pleasant smile.{/n} "To me? Nothing unacceptable for the present circumstances."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла не смотрит на вас прямо — лишь урывками, словно она и не здесь вовсе. Однако на ее губах пляшет улыбка.{/n} "Со мной? Ничего такого, что не принято в текущем положении".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah does not look at you directly — all she gives you is passing glances, as if she is not quite here. Her lips, however, bear a pleasant smile.{/n} "To me? Nothing unacceptable for the present circumstances."

{n}Kibellah does not look at you directly — all she gives you is passing glances, as if she is not quite here. Her lips, however, bear a pleasant smile.{/n} "To me? Nothing unacceptable for the present circumstances."

{n}Kibellah does not look at you directly. Instead, she merely shoots you passing glances, as if she is not quite here. Her lips, however, bear a pleasant smile.{/n} "To me? Nothing unacceptable for the present circumstances."

{n}Kibellah does not look at you directly. Instead, she merely shoots you passing glances, as if she is not quite here. Her lips, however, bear a pleasant smile.{/n} "To me? Nothing unacceptable for the present circumstances."

{n}Kibellah does not look at you directly. Instead, she merely shoots you passing glances, as if she is not quite here. Her lips, however, bear a pleasant smile.{/n} "To me? Nothing unacceptable for the present circumstances."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah sieht dich nicht direkt an. Stattdessen wirft sie dir nur hin und wieder kurze Blicke zu, als sei sie nicht ganz da. Ihre Lippen aber ziert ein angenehmes Lächeln.{/n} "Mit mir? Nichts, was für die momentanen Umstände inakzeptabel wäre."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah does not look at you directly. Instead, she merely shoots you passing glances, as if she is not quite here. Her lips, however, bear a pleasant smile.{/n} "To me? Nothing unacceptable for the present circumstances."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah sieht dich nicht direkt an. Stattdessen wirft sie dir nur hin und wieder kurze Blicke zu, als sei sie nicht ganz da. Ihre Lippen aber ziert ein angenehmes Lächeln.{/n} "Mit mir? Nichts, was für die momentanen Umstände inakzeptabel wäre."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah no te mira directamente. En lugar de ello, te lanza miradas de reojo, como si no estuviera del todo ahí. Sus labios, sin embargo, presentan una sonrisa agradable.{/n} «¿A mí? Nada inaceptable para las circunstancias actuales».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah does not look at you directly. Instead, she merely shoots you passing glances, as if she is not quite here. Her lips, however, bear a pleasant smile.{/n} "To me? Nothing unacceptable for the present circumstances."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah no te mira directamente. En lugar de ello, te lanza miradas de reojo, como si no estuviera del todo ahí. Sus labios, sin embargo, presentan una sonrisa agradable.{/n} «¿A mí? Nada inaceptable para las circunstancias actuales».

languages.text: {n}キベラは、あなたをまっすぐに見ない。その代わりに、まるでここにいるのではないかのように、チラチラとこちらを見るばかりだ。けれどその唇には、穏やかな笑みが浮かんでいる。{/n}「私に？現状では、受け入れられないものなんてないわ」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah does not look at you directly. Instead, she merely shoots you passing glances, as if she is not quite here. Her lips, however, bear a pleasant smile.{/n} "To me? Nothing unacceptable for the present circumstances."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは、あなたをまっすぐに見ない。その代わりに、まるでここにいるのではないかのように、チラチラとこちらを見るばかりだ。けれどその唇には、穏やかな笑みが浮かんでいる。{/n}「私に？現状では、受け入れられないものなんてないわ」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈并没有直视你，而是匆匆地瞥了你一眼，仿佛她本人不在这里一样。不过，她的嘴唇上依然挂着愉悦的微笑。{/n}“我吗？就目前的场合来看，不是什么不可接受的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah does not look at you directly. Instead, she merely shoots you passing glances, as if she is not quite here. Her lips, however, bear a pleasant smile.{/n} "To me? Nothing unacceptable for the present circumstances."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈并没有直视你，而是匆匆地瞥了你一眼，仿佛她本人不在这里一样。不过，她的嘴唇上依然挂着愉悦的微笑。{/n}“我吗？就目前的场合来看，不是什么不可接受的事情。”

languages.text: {n}Un sourire plaisant aux lèvres, Kibellah ne vous regarde pas directement dans les yeux, mais se contente de vous adresser des regards en coin, comme si elle n'était pas vraiment là.{/n} « Pour moi ? Rien d'inacceptable vu les circonstances. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah does not look at you directly. Instead, she merely shoots you passing glances, as if she is not quite here. Her lips, however, bear a pleasant smile.{/n} "To me? Nothing unacceptable for the present circumstances."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire plaisant aux lèvres, Kibellah ne vous regarde pas directement dans les yeux, mais se contente de vous adresser des regards en coin, comme si elle n'était pas vraiment là.{/n} « Pour moi ? Rien d'inacceptable vu les circonstances. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, doğruca sana bakmıyor. Bunun yerine arada sırada sana ufak bakışlar atıyor. Sanki tam olarak burada değilmiş gibi duruyor. Dudaklarınaysa sevimli bir gülümseme hâkim.{/n} "Bana ne mi oldu? Mevcut koşulları göz önünde bulundurursak tasvip edilmeyecek bir şey değil."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah does not look at you directly. Instead, she merely shoots you passing glances, as if she is not quite here. Her lips, however, bear a pleasant smile.{/n} "To me? Nothing unacceptable for the present circumstances."
